# Spells (Alphabetical List - J)
## Ja-Je
**[[Jagged Tooth (Spell)|Jagged Tooth]]****:** Doubles the critical threat range of natural weapons.

**[[Jaws of the Moray (Spell)|Jaws of the Moray]]****:** Subject gains a bite attack.

**[[Jaws of the Wolf (Spell)|Jaws of the Wolf]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** One carving/2 levels turns into a worg.

**[[Jester's Jaunt (Spell)|Jester's Jaunt]]****:** Teleport target within 30 ft. of itself.

**[[Jet of Steam (Spell)|Jet of Steam]]****:** 30-foot line of steam deals 1d4 fire damage/level (max. 5d4).

## Jf-Jj
**[[Jig of the Waves (Spell)|Jig of the Waves]]:** Force creatures to dance a jig which causes penalties and forces random movement.

**[[Jitterbugs (Spell)|Jitterbugs]] <sup>RY</sup>:** Force a creature to become jittery, taking a penalty on Dexterity-related checks and being unable to delay, ready, or take a total defense action.

## Jk-Jo
**[[Joyful Noise (Spell)|Joyful Noise]]****:** You negate *[[Silence (Spell)|silence]]* in a 10-ft.-radius emanation for as long as you concentrate.

**Joyful Rapture:** Negate harmful emotions.

## Ju-Jz
**[[Jump (Spell)|Jump]]****:** Subject gets bonus on [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] checks.

**[[Jump, Mass (Spell)|Jump, Mass]]****:** Many creatures gain bonuses to [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] checks.

**[[Jumpgout (Spell)|Jumpgout]]:** You create a vertical pillar of roaring flame.

**[[Junglerazer (Spell)|Junglerazer]]****:** Fey, vermin, plants, and animals take 1d10 damage/level.

**[[Jungle's Rapture (Spell)|Jungleâ€™s Rapture]]****:** Curse causes 1d6 Dexterity drain.

**Jury-Rig:** Removes the [[Broken|broken]] condition from the targeted object.

**Just Reversal:** Reflects enchantment back at caster.

**[[Just Reversal, Greater (Spell)|Just Reversal, Greater]]****:** As *just reversal,* but with a longer duration.

**[[Justice of the Wyrm King (Spell)|Justice of the Wyrm King]]** **<sup>A</sup>:** Create a field of arcane force that deals 4d6 damage to melee attackers.
